item.title: Protect Your New Roof in Tucson: First-Year Checklist & Care
item.description: A practical, Tucson-specific guide to protecting your new roof—first-year checklist, storm prep, warranty do's and don'ts, and when to call a roofing contractor.
item.content:encoded:
New roof on a new build in Vail? Older but well-built home in Rita Ranch or Oro Valley? The first year is when small details make the biggest difference. Here's a Tucson-specific guide to keep your new roof looking good and performing the way it should—no pricing talk, just practical care and when to call a roofing contractor.

item.title: New Roof Cost in Tucson (2025): What to Expect
item.description: What a new roof costs in Tucson in 2025, what drives price, and simple ways to save without cutting corners. Get real numbers and honest advice from an experienced roofing contractor.
item.content:encoded:
If you're looking at your roof and wondering what a replacement will cost, you're not alone. Every week I meet homeowners in Tucson who've gotten quotes ranging from $8,000 to $35,000 for the same house. That spread makes no sense—until you understand what's driving the number.

I'm Eddie Guillen. I've been installing and repairing roofs across Southern Arizona for over two decades. My wife Viky and I started Sunrise Roofers LLC because we believe you deserve clear information and honest pricing when it comes to a new roof. Let me walk you through what you'll actually pay in 2025 and why.
